alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 19 at 4:05AM AKDT until October 19 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Chilkat Valley in the Haines Borough. * WHEN...Until 600 AM AKDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 401 AM AKDT, Satellite estimates and rain gauge data indicate moderate to heavy rain has been occurring across the advisory area. Minor flooding is expected to begin Wednesday, especially near near the Chilkat River. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible. - Porcupine Road and areas around mile post 14 and 24 of the Haines Highway are the most likely places to experience minor flooding. - For Chilkat River at Klukwan: At 3:00am the stage was 125.5 feet. Flood Stage is 128.0 feet. Forecast: A crest around 128.38 feet is expected around 4:00pm Wednesday. Impacts: At 128.0 feet: Water will begin to flow over the driveway into the property of Chilkat River Adventures just upstream of the Chilkat River bridge. Additionally minor flooding may occur near 14 mile and 25 mile boat launches along with minor flooding of Porcupine Road.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
